text: Ðis syndan þa land ge mæro æt Bennanhamme.
Ærest of cynetan on þa meardic of þære dic on hæddes wyl of þan wylle on clænan crundel.
Of þan crundele on þa readan hane.
Of þære hane on wigmundes swelgende of þan swelgende up on þane hryc andlang hrycces to ællan stapole.

Of þan stapole on accan ge fyrhðe of þan gefyrhðe on meos broces ford of þan forda on scrget of þan gete on holan broces hæffod ðonne on þæt hæcget þanne on <þa> rode easteweurde of þære rode on mær lace of þere lace on stapelford ut on cynetan þanne up andlang healfan stræme eft on mærdic.
